title: Cetona
description: The present town of Cetona grew around the rocca (fortress) of the tenth century A.D., although occupation at the site reaches back to the Paleolithic when a number of caves show evidence for human activity. There are also indications of an Etruscan phase of occupation.

properties.description: Location of the modern settlement based on point geometry derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Cetona
